definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia
the crime of conspiracy to overthrow the government
pinyin: yin1 mou2 dian1 fu4 zheng4 fu3 zui4

sentences.english: A plot was uncovered against the President.
sentences.chinese: 谋害总统的阴谋败露了。

sentences.english: One cannot overlook his uncanny ability to navigate the many political intrigues and maneuverings.
sentences.chinese: 没人能忽略他平息各种政治阴谋诡计的禀赋。

sentences.english: He said he could not bear such internal sabotage any longer.
sentences.chinese: 他说，他再也不能忍受这种内部的阴谋活动了。

sentences.english: We furiously exclaimed upon the wickedness of the plot they conspired against our company.
sentences.chinese: 我们愤怒谴责他们对我们公司策划的阴谋。

sentences.english: They are brewing a plot behind the scenes.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在幕后策划一个阴谋。

sentences.english: The disruption of the Shensi-Kansu-Ningsia Border Region was part of their plot.
sentences.chinese: 陕甘宁边区，是这种阴谋的一部分。

sentences.english: All part of a big conspiracy on the part of the cobblers .
sentences.chinese: 这全是那些修鞋匠阴谋的一部分而已。

sentences.english: Such machinations will likely only get worse.
sentences.chinese: 而使用阴谋诡计只能让事情变得更糟。

sentences.english: The Soviet-German non-aggression treaty smashed this plot.
sentences.chinese: 这种阴谋，被苏德互不侵犯条约击破了。

sentences.english: Federal authorities are now saying a possible assassination plot against Barack Obama posed no credible threat.
sentences.chinese: 联邦政府称可能对奥巴马的刺杀阴谋只是一场虚惊。

sentences.english: The offense of conspiracy is a kind of concurrence of articles of law.
sentences.chinese: 阴谋犯是一种法规竞合犯的形态。

sentences.english: The Gunpowder Plot of 1605 was the most famous of the Catholic conspiracies.
sentences.chinese: 1605年的火药阴谋案是最著名的天主教阴谋。

sentences.english: The Gunpowder Plot of 1605 was the most famous of the Catholic conspiracies.
sentences.chinese: 1605年的火药阴谋案是最著名的天主教阴谋。

sentences.english: Mr. Uribe, one of the targets of the alleged assassination plots, reacted cautiously.
sentences.chinese: 暗杀阴谋的目标之一乌力贝对此反应谨慎。

sentences.english: It's some kind of big conspiracy, right?
The most famous of the Catholic compiracies was the Gunpowder plot of 1605.
sentences.chinese: 最著名的天主教阴谋是1605年的火药阴谋案。

definition: malign agent who manipulates from behind the scenes/hidden hand
undiscovered traitor/enemy within one's own ranks
to lend sb a knife to kill sb/to get sb else to do one's dirty work/to attack using the strength of another (idiom)
to entrap/to set up/to frame (up)/to make false charges against
to reckon/to calculate/to plan/to expect/to scheme
to assassinate/(military) to fight with a bayonet/(baseball) to put out (a baserunner)
